items.content_html: This is a simple yet smart AI Assistant built entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It runs in the browser without any backend, offering a clean interface and real-time interaction. The assistant understands user input and responds instantly, making it a lightweight and interactive tool for everyday help directly from the web.

items.content_html: Sim Studio is an open-source AI agent workflow builder. Sim Studio's interface is a lightweight, intuitive way to quickly build and deploy LLMs that connect with your favorite tools.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.

items.content_html: TabStateSync is a lightweight TypeScript library for synchronizing state across multiple browser tabs. It uses the BroadcastChannel API (with localStorage fallback) to keep data and events in sync between tabs, with no backend or external dependencies required.
items.title: robertluiz/TabStateSync: TabStateSync is a lightweight TypeScript library for synchronizing state across multiple browser tabs. It uses the BroadcastChannel API (with localStorage fallback) to keep data and events in sync between tabs, with no backend or external dependencies required.

items.content_html: UnSQL is an open-source, lightweight JavaScript library that provides schema-less, class based, clean and modern interface to interact with structured Database (MySQL), through dynamic query generation. UnSQL is compatible with JavaScript based runtimes like Node.js and Next.js

UnSQL is compatible with JavaScript based runtimes like Node.js and Next.js

items.content_html: It is a lightweight, cross-platform system utility designed to monitor essential security and health configurations on client machines. It runs silently in the background, periodically checking for system issues like disk encryption status, OS updates, and sleep settings. Changes are securely reported to a central server for real-time monitoring.
items.title: yjain0418/HealthWatch: It is a lightweight, cross-platform system utility designed to monitor essential security and health configurations on client machines. It runs silently in the background, periodically checking for system issues like disk encryption status, OS updates, and sleep settings. Changes are securely reported to a central server for real-time monitoring.
